item.title: Minority
item.description: When I saw the headlines today, it made me feel very sad and disappointed. Switzerland voted yesterday. We have made it illegal to wear a Burka. There are now dress codes in our law. How weird? Not that I never ever saw a women wearing one in Switzerland. So it’s not about preventing people covering their faces. It’s about discriminating a religion. It’s about stimulating fear of foreign cultures. Further we declined the launch of an electronic Identity Document.

item.title: put a file on multiple S3 buckets asynchronous
item.description: Today I was trying hard to write a Lambda function, that deploys a file on multiple S3 buckets asynchronous. My problem was that the files were only uploaded every other time I ran the Lambda. Of course, this behavior suggests, that there was something wrong the Promises and/or the async/await combinations. Unfortunately, I still don’t understand the Promises completely. I once have to dive into it. Finally, my script works. But it is unsatisfactory not understanding completely what’s going on.

item.description: Today I’m very thankful for having good friends. We were out in the forest for a walk and afterwards sitting in the park. We had very good conversations. It’s nice to hear how they’re really doing in these crazy times. Tonight in my Italian practice I learned how to use the adjective vicino and how to conjugate the verb andare.

item.title: Svelte and the Great Space Elevator
item.description: After the speach of Shawn Wang at the JS World Conference this week, I had to watch his video called Svelte and the Great Space Elevator tonight. I absolutely can recommend it. But for now, I have nothing more to say, that I’m really curious about Svelte and its possibilities. I have to look into it… You will find further links in his video description.

item.title: Allowed function parameters in TS
My first post
item.description: Hi there. This is my first blog post. Actually, I’ve got no clue what to achieve and where to end up with this blog. I’m doing just for myself. Kind of a diary. To document where this journey called life leads me to. To be honest, I’m not even really sure about what the content is going to be about. I think I’m going to write down what ever keeps me busy.
